text: phir hamanen jo neqee karen us par apanee neamat pooree karane ke vaaste moosa ko qitaab (tauraut) ata pharamaee aur usamen har cheez kee tafaseel (bayaan kar dee ) thee aur (logon ke lie azasarataapa(sar se pair tak)) hidaayat va rahamat hai taaki vah log apanen paravaradigaar ke saamane haazir hone ka yaqeen karen
